Header: KLN Troops Get 176 More Spectacles to Needy Civilians
Content: 176 more civilians in the general area of Kilinochchi, following arrangements coordinated by Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, Commander, Security Forces-Kilinochchi received spectacles free of charge during a distribution ceremony, organized by the SFHQ -KLN on Sunday (3). The Association of Ophthalmic Opticians of Subhuthipura, Battaramulla at the invitation of the SFHQ-KLN offered their generosity to the humanitarian need. A medical team of the sponsors conducted eye tests before spectacles were given away during the ceremony at Nelumpiyasa auditorium. Commander, Security Forces-Kilinochchi, Brigadier H.M.H.N Herath Brigadier Admin & Quartering, SFHQ-KLN, Civil Affairs Officers, Senior Officers, Officer and Other Ranks participated in the event.
